CustomField.description: Genesys doesn’t allow the mapping of interaction attribute lookup fields (a limitation), so this field is created to enable mapping from Genesys. The trigger will then use this field to populate the case lookup.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Genesys doesn’t allow the mapping of interaction attribute lookup fields (a limitation), so this field is created to enable mapping from Genesys. The trigger will then use this field to populate the case lookup.
CustomField.label: Case Id
